SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PP.ID_CARD AS ID_CARD, CONVERT(varchar(100), PP.BEG_DATE, 23) AS BEG_DATE, CASE WHEN PP.END_DATE IS NULL THEN CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 23) ELSE CONVERT(varchar(100), PP.END_DATE, 23) END AS END_DATE, PP.DEPT_ID AS DEPT_ID, PP.UNIT_PRICE AS UNIT_PRICE, PP.HOSP_NUM AS HOSP_NUM, P.NAME AS paName, CASE WHEN P.IN_HOSP = 0 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS isHosp, DEPT.NAME AS deptName, EMP.emp_name AS doctor FROM PA_PAYSERVICE PP LEFT JOIN PATIENT P ON PP.ID_CARD = P.ID_CARD LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT DEPT ON PP.DEPT_ID = DEPT.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN employee EMP ON PP.REVISER = EMP.id WHERE PP.ID_CARD = #{idCard} ) S WHERE 1=1
AND S.DEPT_ID = #{idCard}
and CONVERT(varchar(100), S.END_DATE, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100),#{startDate}, 23)
and CONVERT(varchar(100),#{endDate}, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100), S.BEG_DATE, 23)
and CONVERT(varchar(100), S.BEG_DATE, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100),#{startDate}, 23) and CONVERT(varchar(100),#{endDate}, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100), S.BEG_DATE, 23) or CONVERT(varchar(100), S.BEG_DATE, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100),#{startDate}, 23) and CONVERT(varchar(100),#{endDate}, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100), S.END_DATE, 23) or CONVERT(varchar(100),#{startDate}) >= CONVERT(varchar(100), S.BEG_DATE, 23) and CONVERT(varchar(100), S.END_DATE, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100),#{endDate}, 23)
